name: Sunflower Maintenance / 向日葵のメンテナンス
name_original: Sunflower Maintenance / 向日葵のメンテナンス
description:
This game was made for the Touhou Station Game Jam. All Touhou intellectual property belongs to ZUN / Team Shanghai Alice, and we greatly appreciate the opportunity to work with a part of it. Other credits present within the game itself.

Below is the original description from the jam submission:

A game where you try to grow sunflowers while fairies steal them and shoot at you.
There is some story content, but it is not necessary to enjoy the gameplay.
ヒマワリを植えて面倒を見ながら邪魔しに来るイタズラ妖精たちをぶっ倒すゲームです。
ストーリー性は特にないのでゲームプレイを楽しめると幸いです
 
Controls:
Arrow keys / 方向キー : move
SPACE: Plant seeds / 種をまく
C: Growth Aura / 成長オーラ
SHIFT: Focus / フォーカス
Z: Shoot / シュート
X: Bomb / スペルカード
CTRL: Skip dialogue / 会話をスキップ
 
Modes:
Story Mode / ストーリーモード
Endless Mode / エンドレスモード
 
Support:
Windows / Mac OS X / Linux

(and yes, I am aware that it says it is a debug version. Don't mind that)
